曟字的基本解释

曟
chén
古同“晨”，指二十八宿之一的房宿。
古指二十八宿之一的心宿，或指北极星。

曟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chén］
［《集韻》丞真切，平真，禪。］
(1)同“晨”。古指房星，二十八宿之一。
(2)古指二十八宿之一的心宿。或指北极星。后作“辰”。

曟字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　曟； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页501第23
【唐韻】植鄰切【集韻】丞眞切，?音辰。【說文】房星，爲民田時者。或省作晨。詳晨字註。【玉篇】亦作辰。

曟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
曟字的起名意思

暂无。

曟
Basic explanation of words
曟
chén
In ancient times, "Morning" refers to one of the twenty-eight lodgings.
Anciently refers to one of the twenty-eight nights, or refers to the North Star.
曟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chén］
["Jiyun" Cheng is true, plain, and Zen. ]
(1) Same as "Morning". Ancient refers to the room star, one of the twenty-eight nights.
(2) Ancient refers to one of the twenty-eight nights. Or refers to the North Star. Later called "Chen".
曟
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　曟; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 501 23
[Tang Yun] Zhi Lin cut [Ji Yun] Cheng Su cut,? Yin Chen. [Said the text] Fang Xing, who was in Mintian time. Or save for morning. Detailed morning note. [Jade articles] Also made Chen.
